title: Grenfell Response News
description_short: Grenfell Response News was a newsletter published by Kensington and Chelsea London Borough Council following the 2017 Grenfell Tower fire.
description_long:
Grenfell Response News (originally Grenfell Fire Response News) was a newsletter published by Kensington and Chelsea London Borough Council (RBKC) following the June 2017 Grenfell Tower fire. The newsletter was published daily and then weekly, and was available in three languages: English, Farsi and Arabic. It was discontinued in December 2017 and replaced with a new newsletter called Grenfell Support News.

All issues of the newsletter were available via the Grenfell Support website but were removed for an unknown reason. After contacting Grenfell Support on twitter, the page was restored excluding a number of translations.
